title: sundara rUpa
sahitya:
sundara rUpa gOpAlanai dinam tudippOm vArungaL nAmellOrum


anupallavi

  anda mOdAdi illAdavanai vaikunTha patiyai shrI lakSmi patiyai


caraNam    pEi ena varum pUtanai mulaip-pAludan uyiraiyum urinjum anbar sahAyanai
piLLaip-paruvam tanil gOpiyar uLLamenum veNNaiyuNDa vAyanai maNNuNDa mAyanai
tAyena varum punita yashOdai enum iDaikkula mangaiyin kaN kuLira sanakAdi yOgiyarum kANariya vishvarUpa darishanam tandavanai
